body.p: The entity concludes that it does not control the access to the database before it is provided to the customer. The entity does not at any time have the ability to direct the use of the licence because the customer contracts for the licence directly with the database provider. The entity does not control access to the provider’s database—it cannot, for example, grant access to the database to a party other than the customer, or prevent the database provider from providing access to the customer.
